016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.mocks;
017
018import de.cuioss.tools.string.MoreStrings;
019import jakarta.faces.component.ContextCallback;
020import jakarta.faces.component.UIComponent;
021import jakarta.faces.component.search.ComponentNotFoundException;
022import jakarta.faces.component.search.SearchExpressionContext;
023import jakarta.faces.component.search.SearchExpressionHandler;
024import jakarta.faces.component.search.SearchExpressionHint;
025import jakarta.faces.context.FacesContext;
026import lombok.Getter;
027import lombok.Setter;
028
029import java.util.ArrayList;
030import java.util.List;
031
032import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
033
034/**
035 * Mock variant of {@link SearchExpressionHandler} to be used for unit-tests.
036 * The concrete instance can be derived via {@link #retrieve(FacesContext)}
037 *
038 * @author Oliver Wolff
039 */
040public class CuiMockSearchExpressionHandler extends SearchExpressionHandler {
041
042    private static final String UNABLE_TO_FIND_COMPONENT_WITH_EXPRESSION = "Unable to find component with expression = ";
043
044    private static final String NOT_IMPLEMENTED = "Not implemented";
045
046    @Getter
047    @Setter
048    private UIComponent resolvedComponent;
049
050    @Getter
051    @Setter
052    private List<UIComponent> resolvedComponents = new ArrayList<>();
053
054    @Getter
055    @Setter
056    private String resolvedClientId;
057
058    @Getter
059    @Setter
060    private List<String> resolvedClientIds = new ArrayList<>();
061
062    /**
063     * Shorthand for accessing an instance of {@link CuiMockSearchExpressionHandler}
064     *
065     * @param context to be used
066     * @return the previously configured {@link CuiMockSearchExpressionHandler}
067     */
068    public static final CuiMockSearchExpressionHandler retrieve(FacesContext context) {
069        return (CuiMockSearchExpressionHandler) context.getApplication().getSearchExpressionHandler();
070
071    }
072
073    @Override
074    public String resolveClientId(SearchExpressionContext searchExpressionContext, String expression) {
075        if (MoreStrings.isEmpty(expression)) {
076            throw new ComponentNotFoundException(UNABLE_TO_FIND_COMPONENT_WITH_EXPRESSION + expression);
077        }
078        return resolvedClientId;
079    }
080
081    @Override
082    public List<String> resolveClientIds(SearchExpressionContext searchExpressionContext, String expressions) {
083        if (MoreStrings.isEmpty(expressions)) {
084            throw new ComponentNotFoundException(UNABLE_TO_FIND_COMPONENT_WITH_EXPRESSION + expressions);
085        }
086        return resolvedClientIds;
087    }
088
089    @Override
090    public void resolveComponent(SearchExpressionContext searchExpressionContext, String expression,
091                                 ContextCallback callback) {
092        if (MoreStrings.isEmpty(expression)) {
093            throw new ComponentNotFoundException(UNABLE_TO_FIND_COMPONENT_WITH_EXPRESSION + expression);
094        }
095        if (null != resolvedComponent) {
096            callback.invokeContextCallback(searchExpressionContext.getFacesContext(), resolvedComponent);
097        } else if (shouldIgnoreNoResult(searchExpressionContext)) {
098            throw new ComponentNotFoundException(UNABLE_TO_FIND_COMPONENT_WITH_EXPRESSION + expression);
099        }
100
101    }
102
103    @Override
104    public void resolveComponents(SearchExpressionContext searchExpressionContext, String expressions,
105                                  ContextCallback callback) {
106        requireNonNull(resolvedComponents);
107        if (MoreStrings.isEmpty(expressions)) {
108            throw new ComponentNotFoundException(UNABLE_TO_FIND_COMPONENT_WITH_EXPRESSION + expressions);
109        }
110        if (resolvedComponents.isEmpty() && shouldIgnoreNoResult(searchExpressionContext)) {
111            throw new ComponentNotFoundException("Unable to find components with expression = " + expressions);
112        }
113
114        resolvedComponents.forEach(
115            component -> callback.invokeContextCallback(searchExpressionContext.getFacesContext(), component));
116    }
117
118    private boolean shouldIgnoreNoResult(SearchExpressionContext searchExpressionContext) {
119        var expressionHints = searchExpressionContext.getExpressionHints();
120        return null == expressionHints || !expressionHints.contains(SearchExpressionHint.IGNORE_NO_RESULT);
121    }
122
123    @Override
124    public void invokeOnComponent(SearchExpressionContext searchExpressionContext, UIComponent previous,
125                                  String expression, ContextCallback topCallback) {
126        throw new UnsupportedOperationException(NOT_IMPLEMENTED);
127    }
128
129    @Override
130    public String[] splitExpressions(FacesContext context, String expressions) {
131        throw new UnsupportedOperationException(NOT_IMPLEMENTED);
132    }
133
134    @Override
135    public boolean isPassthroughExpression(SearchExpressionContext searchExpressionContext, String expression) {
136        throw new UnsupportedOperationException(NOT_IMPLEMENTED);
137    }
138
139    @Override
140    public boolean isValidExpression(SearchExpressionContext searchExpressionContext, String expression) {
141        throw new UnsupportedOperationException(NOT_IMPLEMENTED);
142    }
143}
